name: Dimsheller Maze
description:
All who defy the Eternal king of the Gloomvale are thrown into the abandoned Dimsheller mine. A dark maze full of dead ends and dark murky water. Those who find a way out get a 2nd chance. Those who don't perish. Can you find the exit?

Windows 2000 and up 8MB VRAM?

G3 MAC 10.3.9 8MB VRAM?
